titleStmt.title: W. R. Hyder to Beriah Magoffin
CWG3086

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Apprehension of Fugitives from Justice Papers, 1859-1862

body.p:
Louisville Feby 21st 1861
His Excellency Gov Magoffin
Sir

I have in my hands a Felony Warrant Issued from the City Court clrk's office of this city on the 21st inst foragst one Sally E Grant who is at present in Indianapolis Ind I wish a Requisition on the Governor of Indiana and Jesse FA Hammon appointed special bailiff agent to bring her to this State.

Yours Resp
W R Hydes
Marshall City
Court of Louisville
